personal.content: To Improve My Learning Skills Of Being An IT Students.To Achieve The Goals That I Want To Myself And Also To My Family .

personal.name: Pauline Luz Maigting
personal.content: My First Goal Is, To Improve My Skills In Taking This Course And To Be Graduate Of Being An IT Studets.My Second Goal Is, I Hope I Can Find A Stable Job Being An IT Or Any Job Related In IT.

personal.name: Kristuf Lamonte
personal.content: My First Goal Is, I Want To Be A Succesful Business Man.My Second Goal, If Im Going To Be A Successful Business Man, I Will Also Give Some Charity To The People Who Are Homeless And Dont Have Stable Job To Support Their Family.
